root: ^I could see you from a mile away, Bess. How have you been?
^I have a date soon, hehe. With Sir Davis.
^The stall vendor who comes by? I didn't think he had a title.
^The very one! I just like to call him that, he's handsome like a "Sir."
^I used to only be able to talk to him on Sundays but he's been coming into the village more nowadays.
^Says his boss wants to have more trade going our way but between you and me, I think he just wants to see me, heh.
^You know I leave quite the impression!

c-0: ^How romantic... Does Kellen know it's a date?
^But! Once I woo him he won't be able to stay away for long.
c-1: ^Thats... wonderful Bess. I'm sure he's over the moon waiting.
^You and me both! Oh! I've been so nervous!
g-0: ^I was thinking about ways to win him over. I am skilled in a lot of things, as you well know.
^I think a love potion would be a bit extreme... Surely there's less... forceful ways.
^Why don't you try something you're good at?
^I'm great at many things! If not a love potion then...
^Well, I am a pretty good singer. Can you give me something to make for that?
^I can defnitely do that. I'll make a hummingbird out of you just yet.
^task:My Sixth Task $Bess $Bess wants to impress Davis. Luckily, I was able to talk her out of a love potion and towards something a bit more of herself.
